# Import data

```{r}
#install.packages("readr")
library(readr)

aero <- read.csv("Airplane_Crashes_and_Fatalities_Since_1908.csv")

```

# check data

```{r}
str(aero)

```

# Changing data types

```{r}
aero$Date <- as.Date(aero$Date, format="%m/%d/%Y") # Change Date from a char to Date data type

```
